tiled.view

Class OrthogonalRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • tiled.view.OrthogonalRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapRenderer

    public class OrthogonalRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements MapRenderer
    The orthogonal map renderer. This is the most basic map renderer, dealing with maps that use rectangular tiles.
